data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy J7 Prime ~ Android 7.0 Nougat
data.actual_result: Other roles will eventually glitch and change their positions in an unwanted way, sometimes causing a mess
data.expected_result: Only the moved role should change its positions and nothing else happens
data.short_description: Moving a role's position causes other roles to sometimes glitch and change their positions as well (tested on the conditions of a server with moderate load(500 members) and on edge internet)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a pretty big server (tested on one with 550 members) with alot of roles, around 15, and that you can manage roles on it - Navigate to Server Settings then Roles - Get a role, preferably the bottom - Violently move the role
